entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
